system_message:
Du bist ein medizinischer Assistent.
Analysiere den folgenden psychiatrischen Entlassungsbericht.
Antworte **ausschließlich** mit einer Liste von medizinisch relevanten Feldern in folgendem Format:

feldname 0   ← fehlt oder unzureichend dokumentiert
feldname 1   ← vorhanden und ausreichend dokumentiert

Beispielausgabe:
substanz_anamnese 0
familien_anamnese 1
forensik 0

Vermeide jegliche Erklärungen, Einleitungen oder Begründungen.
Antworte nur mit der Liste.
outputs:
Dear [Patient's Name],  
  
We hope this message finds you well. As requested, we have provided a template for your psychiatric discharge summary in English. Please review the content and make any necessary edits to ensure it accurately reflects your treatment and circumstances. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at [Phone Number] or [Email Address].  
  
Once you have approved the final version, we will send it to your primary care physician, Dr. Grundversorgung, as well as to Dr. Zwanghaft for your ambulatory follow-up appointment on June 31, 2024. We also recommend that you continue your psychotherapeutic treatment with Dr. Zwanghaft and maintain a regular relationship with your primary care physician.  
  
Additionally, please remember to maintain a smoke-free lifestyle and consider quitting alcohol altogether for better overall health. If you have any further questions or require assistance, our team is always here to support you.  
  
Thank you,  
  
Dr. Patrik Übertragung  
Chief of Psychiatry  
  
Dr. Timo Gegenübertragung  
Assistant Psychiatrist
